record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME AS COSPONSOR OF H. RES. 865
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME AS COSPONSOR OF H. RES. 865 -- (House of Representatives - April 02, 2008)

[Page: H1942]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent to remove my name as a cosponsor of H. Res. 865.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Indiana?
